verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H1980>me<s%>, Go and <S%H7069>get<s%> a <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H232>belt<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> it upon your <S%H4975>body<s%>, and <S%H935>put<s%> it not in <S%H4325>water<s%>.
So I <S%H7069>got<s%> a <S%H232>belt<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> it on my <S%H4975>body<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto me the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H232>belt<s%> that you have <S%H7069>got<s%>, which is upon your <S%H4975>body<s%>, and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, and <S%H2934>hide<s%> it there in a <S%H5357>hole<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>.
So I <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H2934>hid<s%> it by <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> commanded <S%H6680>me<s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6965>me<s%>, Arise, <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H232>belt<s%> from <S%H6680>there<s%>, which I commanded you to hide <S%H2934>there<s%>.

Then I <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, and <S%H2658>dug<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H232>belt<s%> from the <S%H4725>place<s%> where I had <S%H2934>hid<s%> <S%H232>it<s%>: and, behold, the belt was <S%H7843>marred<s%>, it was profitable for <S%H6743>nothing<s%>.
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, After this manner will I <S%H7843>mar<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

This <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, which <S%H3987>refuse<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>, which <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7812>them<s%>, and to worship <S%H232>them<s%>, shall even be as this belt, which is good for <S%H6743>nothing<s%>.

For as the <S%H232>belt<s%> <S%H1692>cleaves<s%> to the <S%H4975>body<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>, so have I caused to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto me the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; that they might be unto me for a <S%H5971>people<s%>, and for a <S%H8034>name<s%>, and for a <S%H8416>praise<s%>, and for a <S%H8597>glory<s%>: but they would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>.

Therefore you shall <S%H559>speak<s%> unto them this <S%H1697>word<s%>; Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Every <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine<s%>: and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3045>you<s%>, Do we not certainly <S%H3045>know<s%> that every <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine<s%>?

Then shall you <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H4390>Behold<s%>, I will fill all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land<s%>, even the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H3678>throne<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, with <S%H7943>drunkenness<s%>.

And I will <S%H5310>dash<s%> them <S%H376>one<s%> against <S%H251>another<s%>, even the <S%H1>fathers<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: I will not <S%H2550>pity<s%>, nor <S%H2347>spare<s%>, nor have <S%H7355>mercy<s%>, but destroy <S%H7843>them<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H238>you<s%>, and give ear; be not <S%H1361>proud<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

<S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, before he cause <S%H2821>darkness<s%>, and before your <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5062>stumble<s%> upon the <S%H5399>dark<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, <S%H6960>and<s%>, while you look for <S%H216>light<s%>, he <S%H7760>turn<s%> it into the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, and <S%H7896>make<s%> it gross <S%H6205>darkness<s%>.

But if you will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H5315>it<s%>, my soul shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places<s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> your <S%H1466>pride<s%>; and my <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H1830>weep<s%> <S%H1830>severe<s%>, and run <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H1832>tears<s%>, because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H5739>flock<s%> is carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%>.

<S%H559>Say<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> and to the <S%H1377>queen<s%>, <S%H8213>Humble<s%> <S%H3427>yourselves<s%>, sit down: for your <S%H4761>principalities<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%>, even the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of your <S%H8597>glory<s%>.

The <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be shut <S%H5462>up<s%>, and none shall <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H3063>them<s%>: Judah shall be carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> all of <S%H7965>it<s%>, it shall be wholly carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> them that <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%>: where is the <S%H5739>flock<s%> that was <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H8597>you<s%>, your beautiful <S%H6629>flock<s%>?

What will you <S%H559>say<s%> when he shall <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3925>you<s%>? for you have taught them to be <S%H441>captains<s%>, and as <S%H7218>chief<s%> over <S%H2256>you<s%>: shall not sorrows <S%H270>take<s%> <S%H802>you<s%>, as a woman in <S%H3205>hardship<s%>?

And if you <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, Therefore <S%H7122>come<s%> these things upon <S%H7230>me<s%>? For the greatness of your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> are your <S%H7757>skirts<s%> <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, and your <S%H6119>heels<s%> made <S%H2554>bore<s%>.

Can the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H2015>change<s%> his <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or the <S%H5246>leopard<s%> his <S%H2272>spots<s%>? then <S%H3201>may<s%> you also do <S%H3190>good<s%>, that are <S%H3928>accustomed<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%>.
Therefore will I <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them as the <S%H7179>stubble<s%> that passes <S%H5674>away<s%> by the <S%H7307>wind<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

This is your <S%H1486>lot<s%>, the <S%H4490>portion<s%> of your <S%H4055>measures<s%> from <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; because you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H982>me<s%>, and trusted in <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>.
Therefore will I <S%H2834>discover<s%> your <S%H7757>skirts<s%> upon your <S%H6440>face<s%>, that your <S%H7036>shame<s%> may <S%H7200>appear<s%>.

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H5004>adulteries<s%>, and your <S%H4684>neighings<s%>, the <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> of your <S%H2184>whoredom<s%>, and your <S%H8251>abominations<s%> on the <S%H1389>hills<s%> in the <S%H7704>fields<s%>. <S%H188>Woe<s%> unto <S%H3389>you<s%>, O Jerusalem! will you not be made <S%H2891>clean<s%>? when shall it once <S%H5750>be<s%>?
